content:
Hello. In my IG, the StructureDefinition pages always have the Constraints part empty. If i click on an element from the profile, i see the invariants are well herited from the parent resource but they don't appear on main page.
I didn't have that problem before using sushi. Is there something specific with sushi to display them?
that's a change that we made in the IG publisher - people don't want to see those base constraints again and again
